it.polito.dp2.FDS

Class Time

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polito.dp2.FDS.Time

  • public class Time
extends Object
    Represents a read-only hh::mm time Hours range from 00 to 24 and minutes from 00 to 59

        Builds a Time object
